title: ILAY FIFALIAN-DEHIBE

verses.1:
Hisy andro fifalian-dehibe
Ho foana ireo sento
Ho faf√†na ny ranomaso re
Ho fifalian-dehibe
verses.2:
Ho adino ireo alahelo
Ho lasa ny hakiviana
Hahita ny tavan'ny Tompo re
Ho fifalian-dehibe.
verses.3:
Ho hita ireo namana
Sy ireo malala rahetra
Izay lasa nodimandry taloha
Ho fivorian-dehibe.
verses.4:
Nefa izao no tena lehibe
Ny hahita an'i Jesosy
Io no tena fifalian-dehibe
Ho fifalian-dehibe.

chorus:
Tsy andriko izany re!
Ho fifalian-dehibe
Raha androany izany re!
Ho fifalian-dehibe
